description:
Discover the most popular destinations of the world with tripwolf -  your mobile travel guide! 

Follow the recommendations of the tripwolf community and get tips from experienced travel writers. The app includes maps (also available offline!), free updates and a FREE premium guide for Florence!

+ Apple’s “Your Verse“ by Chérie King 2014 +

+ CNN's Top 50 Travel Apps 2013 +

+ WIRED magazine’s “essential app” 2012 +

IN-APP TRAVEL GUIDES
Use the free highlights guide to get an overview of content, features and design of the premium guides or upgrade your guide and get full access to premium content and reliable travel info for hundreds of points of interests.

WORKS OFFLINE
Avoid roaming fees abroad: all guides, features and maps work also without Internet connection (offline maps).

ATTRACTIONS, HOTELS, RESTAURANTS, BARS & MORE
Browse through the world’s most exciting cities, discover unique landmarks and benefit from local insider tips. 

TRAVEL TIPS FROM THOUSANDS OF TRAVELERS
Get authentic recommendations and traveler reviews for more than 700 different destinations throughout the world!

SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES
Feeling social? Write reviews of places you've discovered and share them with your friends and tripwolf’s community of thousands of worldwide globetrotters!

TRIP PLANNER
Plan and organize your trip, calculate the shortest route and display it on a map!

TRAVEL STORIES FROM THE TRIPWOLF BLOG
Budget holidays in Japan? Where to eat in New York? Access genuine up-to-date information written by the tripwolf editorial team and our guest bloggers!

OTHER FEATURES
- The tripwolf social travel guide is available in 5 languages: English, German, French, Italian and Spanish.

-  “You Are Here” Marker on Maps: During your holiday or vacation use the Maps with current location indicator.

- Registration in the tripwolf community to mark your own favorite places, upload travel photos and see tips from your friends.

- Sort and Filter attractions by popularity, distance, and type.

- Subway maps helping you to get around in each major city.

- Hundreds of POIs covering the best sights, restaurants, shops, nightlife spots and most exciting things to do.


About tripwolf – your social travel guide
tripwolf combines travel tips from professional travel writers with a vast collection of travel information, experiences and reviews from a worldwide community of thousands of travelers just like you.

Browse through more than 700 different destinations, in the form of country, region, or city guides, get expert recommendations, read travel blogs and make use of the tripwolf offline travel map.
Plus: Import your friends through Facebook and share your travel pictures.

The most popular guides of tripwolf users: 

Barcelona Travel Guide 
Paris Travel Guide 
New York Travel Guide 
Vienna Travel Guide 
Berlin Travel Guide 
Rome Travel Guide 
London Travel Guide 
Venice Travel Guide 
Madrid Travel Guide 


Offline Maps: © OpenStreetMap and contributors, CC-BY-SA (http://www.openstreetmap.org/)

trackName: tripwolf - your travel guide with offline maps
releaseNotes:
### Better, more attractive maps ###

With this release we have dramatically improved the quality of our map feature. Our maps now show a higher level of detail, you can zoom in and out of them seamlessly, and at the same time they are faster to download.
